name: Growth TD
description:
Growth TD is our entry for 2021's Go Godot Jam! 🌱

Your task is to defend against the waves of incoming Cubicorn enemies. You only have a bunch of plants and a Rain spell in your arsenal of towers. But this is not all! You can merge 3 plants of the same type to make one much stronger!

Controls: Drag and drop the cards and plants on the desired locations on the table 

How to merge towers: Drag and drop 2 towers of the same type into the third one, to make it GROW.

TIPS:
Move plants around and change their positions

  • Constantly MERGE them to grow their power!

Let us know your feedback in the comments.
